text: 2.16: Sng 143.2; FG 13.38-39; 15.10-11; Ro 1.17; 3.20-28; 4.5; 11.6; Ga 3.11; Hi 7.18-19Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme, ana Moses suaŋgi tɨvira zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, ana ne ndɨkndɨgap, tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir mben kaai fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Guma, ana guigira Krais Zisas khothɨgim, Fhe Bakɨme mba guma, ana tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui guman mba guman kaai. Nza vhɨra, nza guigira Krais Zisas khothɨgap, nza vhɨra khueŋ kaŋgi, mba tuav Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgir nzan kaai. Ana nza Moses suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui ne nzuav fhuvara. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, guma the tuituigip Moses suaŋgi tɨvi, ana nta zɨn ŋgɨrim, Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui guman ana kamgire? Fhuvara.
